name: 3D Sliding Puzzle
description:
Solve the different sliding puzzle images!

All images were generated by AI and are accompanied by several music tracks. You can start a quick game with a random image or select the one you want.

Features in the current version:
- 10 different landscapes generated by AI
- 5+2 different songs
- solve a random puzzle or select the one you want
- no advertisements or microtransactions!

More puzzles / images will be added in future updates.
